about_the_game:
The Clubies is a party platformer where players navigate cute cube characters through the disco to reach the dancefloor! Encounter various hazards, puzzles, and shortcuts in a fun, colorful environment as you master user-built levels together.

Our little Cluby dreams of building the world's most fabulous club! To achieve this, he must conduct market research - which means dancing on every dancefloor across the globe to learn what makes a great club!
Cluby doesn't want to dance alone, so he can clone himself! This creates hilarious chaos with tricky puzzles to solve and physics-based controls that reveal the craziest shortcuts.

Our game is a fun party platformer, perfect for casual gamers and offering a fantastic medium for social interactions and friendly competition. Players can enjoy fascinating levels created by friends, either having a blast together in Co-op mode or competing for the best times.
Our user-friendly level editor allows those who want to create their own levels to bring their creative ideas to life and share them with others. All this takes place in a cheerful and colorful environment, providing hours of fun and shared experiences.
